front.title: OMA BCAST MIKEY General Extension Payload Specification

abstract.t: This document specifies a new General Extension payload type for use in the Open Mobile Alliance's (OMA) Browser and Content (BAC) Broadcast (BCAST) group. OMA BCAST's service and content protection specification uses short term key message (STKM) and long term key message (LTKM) payloads that in certain broadcast distribution systems (BDS) are carried in the IETF MIKEY protocol [1]. A new MIKEY General Extension payload specified in this document will be used for that purpose.
